00039 /**
00040  * @file
00041  *
00042  * Encapsulation of OCTEON mailbox interrupts.
00043  *
00044  */
00045 #ifndef __CVMX_MBOX_H__
00046 #define __CVMX_MBOX_H__
00047 
00048 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00049 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00050 extern "C" {
00051 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #ifndef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_USER
00055 struct cvmx_mbox;
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * Function prototype for mailbox interrupt handlers
00059  */
00060 typedef void (* cvmx_mbox_func_t)(struct cvmx_mbox *self, uint64_t *registers);
00061 
00062 /**
00063  * Main structure for manipulating mailbox interrupts.
00064  */
00065 struct cvmx_mbox {
00066     cvmx_mbox_func_t handler; /**< Set by user code, the handler function for the mailbox interrupt */
00067 };
00068 /**
00069  * Register a mailbox interrupt handler for the specified interrupt number.
00070  *
00071  * @param bit      Mailbox bit to register a handler for.
00072  * @param handler  Handler information.
00073  */
00074 extern CVMX_SHARED void (*cvmx_mbox_register)(unsigned int bit, struct cvmx_mbox *handler);
00075 
00076 #endif /* !CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_USER */
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * Return the number of usable mailbox bits in the system.
00080  *
00081  * @return The hardware dependent number of mailbox bits.
00082  */
00083 int cvmx_mbox_num_bits(void);
00084 
00085 /**
00086  * Initialize the mailbox interrupt system for the specified bits.
00087  *
00088  * @param mbox_mask a bitmask of the mailbox bits that will be used by the program.
00089  */
00090 void cvmx_mbox_initialize(uint32_t mbox_mask);
00091 
00092 /**
00093  * Signal a mailbox interrupt handler for the specified bit and core.
00094  *
00095  * @param bit      Mailbox bit to signal.
00096  * @param core     The core to signal.
00097  */
00098 extern CVMX_SHARED void (*cvmx_mbox_signal)(unsigned int bit, unsigned int core);
00099 
00100 /**
00101  * Mailbox bit numbers used by simple-executive,
00102  * and a few mailbox numbers available for the user application
00103  */
00104 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_HOTPLUG_SHUTDOWN      0
00105 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_HOTPLUG_REMOVECORES   1
00106 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_HOTPLUG_ADDCORES      2
00107 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_OTRACE            3
00108 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_RESERVED          4
00109 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_USER_0            5
00110 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_USER_1            6
00111 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_USER_2            7
00112 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_USER_3            8
00113 #define CVMX_MBOX_BIT_USER_4            9
00114 
00115 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00116 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00117 }
00118 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00119 #endif
00120 
00121 #endif
